languages.text: "Что же, по крайней мере ты не лжешь себе. Ты — грязн{mf|ый|ая} богохульни{mf|к|ца} и скверна в Его глазах. Как и я. Как и все мы. Это — {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}, и благочестивых здесь нет, лишь порочные и закосневшие в мерзости".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, по крайней мере ты не лжешь себе. Ты — грязн{mf|ый|ая} богохульни{mf|к|ца} и скверна в Его глазах. Как и я. Как и все мы. Это — Простор Коронус, и благочестивых здесь нет, лишь порочные и закосневшие в мерзости".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."
languages.original_text: "Что же, по крайней мере ты не лжешь себе. Ты — грязн{mf|ый|ая} богохульни{mf|к|ца} и скверна в Его глазах. Как и я. Как и все мы. Это — {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простор Коронус{/g}, и благочестивых здесь нет, лишь порочные и закосневшие в мерзости".

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. And so am I. And so are we all. This is the Koronus Expanse, and there is no virtue here, only sinners steeped in villainy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. And so am I. And so are we all. This is the Koronus Expanse, and there is no virtue here, only sinners steeped in villainy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the Koronus Expanse, and there is no virtue here, only sinners steeped in villainy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the Koronus Expanse, and there is no virtue here, only sinners steeped in villainy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “很好，至少你没有自欺欺人。你是个肮脏的亵渎者，是在祂眼中的污点。而我也是，我们都是。这里是{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，这里没有美德，只有深陷在恶行之中的罪人。”
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: “很好，至少你没有自欺欺人。你是个肮脏的亵渎者，是在祂眼中的污点。而我也是，我们都是。这里是{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}，这里没有美德，只有深陷在恶行之中的罪人。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Bueno, al menos no se engaña a sí mism{mf|o|a}. Es u{mf|n|na} blasfem{mf|o|a} y una plaga ante Sus ojos, igual que todos nosotros. Esta es la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, y aquí no hay virtudes, solo profanadores consumidos por la maldad».
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, al menos no se engaña a sí mism{mf|o|a}. Es u{mf|n|na} blasfem{mf|o|a} y una plaga ante Sus ojos, igual que todos nosotros. Esta es la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, y aquí no hay virtudes, solo pecadores consumidos por la maldad».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「まあ、自分に嘘をついていないだけ良しとしましょう。あなたは汚らわしい冒涜者であり、皇帝の目から見れば害悪でしかない。私もそうです。ここは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}です…美徳など存在せず、あるのは冒涜者に染まった罪人だけです」
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、自分に嘘をついていないだけ良しとしましょう。あなたは汚らわしい冒涜者であり、皇帝の目から見れば害悪でしかない。私もそうです。ここは{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}です…美徳など存在せず、あるのは極悪非道に染まった罪人だけです」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Nun, zumindest belügt Ihr Euch nicht selbst. Ihr seid {mf|ein dreckiger Gotteslästerer|eine dreckige Gotteslästerin} und ein Pesthauch in seinen Augen. Genau wie ich. Genau wie wir alle. Das hier ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}, und hier gibt es keine Tugend, nur schurkenhafte Sünder."
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, zumindest belügt Ihr Euch nicht selbst. Ihr seid {mf|ein dreckiger Gotteslästerer|eine dreckige Gotteslästerin} und ein Pesthauch in seinen Augen. Genau wie ich. Genau wie wir alle. Das hier ist die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}, und hier gibt es keine Tugend, nur schurkische Sünder."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Au moins, vous regardez la vérité en face. Vous êtes {mf|un vil blasphémateur|une vile blasphématrice} et un fléau à Ses yeux. Tout comme moi. Tout comme nous tous. Telles sont les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, où la vertu n'a pas cours. On n'y croise rien d'autre que d'infâmes profanateurs. »
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: « Au moins, vous regardez la vérité en face. Vous êtes {mf|un vil blasphémateur|une vile blasphématrice} et un fléau à Ses yeux. Tout comme moi. Tout comme nous tous. Telles sont les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, où la vertu n'a pas cours. On n'y croise rien d'autre que d'infâmes pécheurs. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "En azından kendine yalan söylemiyorsun. Pis bir günahkârsın ve O'nun gözünde bir küften ibaretsin. Ben de öyleyim. Hepimiz öyleyiz. Burası {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}. Burada erdemin 'e'si yoktur, yalnızca şerre bulanmış dinsizler vardır."
languages.original_text: "Well, at least you're not lying to yourself. You are a filthy blasphemer and a blight in His eyes. As am I. As are we all. This is the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, and there is no virtue here, only profaners steeped in villainy."

traits.locale_text: "Eh en azından kendine karşı yalan söylemiyorsun. Sen pis bir günahkârsın ve O'nun gözünde bir lekeden başka bir şey değilsin. Ben de öyleyim. Hepimiz öyleyiz. Burası {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g} ve burada erdemin 'e'si yoktur, burada yalnızca kötülük amaçlayan dinsizler vardır."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
